body: @aromah It's not inconsistent, though. It's just that she thought it was a dream(who would want to believe that was real? it's called denial...perhaps even memory repression), so it's not "just played off somehow". Also, the guy isn't the main character, the mother in law is...that's why the story is told from HER point of view.

This doujinshi has too many moments that's trying to trick you, and without having logical consistency. The wife saw them fucking and that's just played off somehow. Also I didn't like the main character, he was just straight up an asshole. The only thing that came out of the interaction was that the mother-in-law wants to be with the douchebag guy but she can't.
The wife: stupid the husband: stupid the mom: slutty whore the guy: a cheating bastard this shit stinks
lol daughter just passes it off as a bad dream... bruh. momoko and yusuke even kissed each other haha
